overlay-tweaks.container-background-opac: Set the transparency of container backgrounds. Set to 0 to make it completely transparent.
overlay-tweaks.container-texture-opacity: Set the transparency of container textures. Set to 0 to make it completely transparent.
overlay-tweaks.click-out-of-containers.d: Allows clicking outside the bounds of a container to close it.
overlay-tweaks.disable-hand-view-sway.de: Disables the hand view sway when moving your mouse.
overlay-tweaks.keep-hand-in-hidden-hud.d: Keep your hand/held item in view when hiding hud (pressing F1).
overlay-tweaks.hand-invisibility-opacity: Show your hand while invisible at a custom opacity. Set to 0% to disable.
overlay-tweaks.heart-display-type.descri: Always you to change the default heart style to hardcore or regular hearts, ignoring current game difficulty.
overlay-tweaks.remove-water-overlay.desc: Removes the underwater overlay when in water.
overlay-tweaks.remove-submerged-fov-chan: Stops the FOV from changing when you go under water or lava.
overlay-tweaks.remove-fire-overlay-when-: Removes the fire overlay when you are resistant to fire, such as when you have fire resistance or are in creative mode.
overlay-tweaks.fire-overlay-height.descr: Change the height of the fire overlay if your pack does not have low fire. May improve visibility.
overlay-tweaks.fire-overlay-opacity.desc: The value for fire overlay opacity.
overlay-tweaks.remove-held-item-name-too: Removes the tooltip above the hotbar when holding an item.
overlay-tweaks.subtitle-background-color: The color for the background of the subtitle HUD.
overlay-tweaks.elder-guardian-opacity.de: Changes the opacity of the elder guardian particle effect from showing on your screen.
overlay-tweaks.elder-guardian-scale.desc: Changes the scale of the elder guardian particle effect from showing on your screen.
overlay-tweaks.equippable-overlay-opacit: Changes the opacity of the equippable overlay when wearing an item you can equip, such as pumpkins.
Changes the maximum opacity of the freezing overlay when inside powdered snow. It will take the same amount of time to reach the maximum opacity as vanilla does.
Changes the opacity of the spyglass overlay.
overlay-tweaks.spyglass-background-color: Allows setting a custom color for the background of nametags.
overlay-tweaks.constant-vignette-darknes: Apply a constant vignette regardless of sky light level.
overlay-tweaks.nether-portal-opacity.des: The max opacity for the nether portal fade in effect.
overlay-tweaks.color-shield-cooldown.des: Adds a color to your shield depending on the cooldown remaining.
overlay-tweaks.shield-color-high.descrip: The color when the cooldown has just started.
overlay-tweaks.shield-color-mid.descript: The cooldown in the middle of the timer.
overlay-tweaks.shield-color-low.descript: The color when the cooldown is about to end.
